ComicInfo.Title: The Eclipse; Bookmarks!; Hint & Run; It All Fits!; Teardrop; Milk; Garden
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-10 19:47:21. [CVDB328813] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 02:15:26. [Issue ID 264234]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Barefootz and Dolly encounter a cosmic phenomenon.
Dolly wants to go on Barefootz's date.
Wally shows off.
Barefootz gives Glory her medicine and gets hit by a lot of frogs.
The cockroaches don't like Barefootz's window placement.
Barefootz tries to silence an alarm clock.
Barefootz gives the last piece of cake to the cockroaches.
A gang pretending to be selling magazine subscriptions robs Barefootz.
When Glory gets made she makes a lot of frogs that make the vacuum cleaner all soggy.
Barefootz and Dolly contemplate God, trees, flowers, rain, Heaven and how it all fits.
Fizzo gets zapped by Glory.
Barefootz describes a wheatcakes recipe, that includes cockroaches, to a pair of cockroaches
Barefootz tell the cockroaches a story that leaves nothing to their imagination.
Glory is a picky eater.
Fizzo's motivational syndrome is having an identity crisis.
The cockroaches get scared watching television and run and find Barefootz.
Dolly wants to see if Glory could inspire her and gets hit with frogs.
Sometimes the execution of painting falls short of the conception.
Headrack gets inspired by Barefootz's pet, Glory.
Headrack criticizes his own work.
The cockroaches are getting kinky in the dark, in the bathroom.
Dolly wonders why Barefootz hasn't been to bed with her.
Headrack's pet cat, Fritzi, gets zapped into a golf ball by Barefootz's pet, Glory.
Barefootz gets teary eyed over a sunset.
Barefootz's pet Glory destroys her milk bowl.
There is a garden in the middle of the strip.
